sense.def:
To be opposed to something
pomeni, da se nekdo ne strinja z nečim ali da nečesa ne odobrava.

seg.quote: They were violently opposed to the idea.
I am opposed to capital punishment.

sense.def:
Kadar si dve zamisli ali dva sistema nasprotujeta ali sta si zelo različna, rečemo, da sta
opposed
.

seg.quote: ...two bitterly opposed schools of socialist thought.
...a strategy which is diametrically opposed to that of the previous government.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
as opposed to
pokažemo, da govorimo o neki določeni zadevi in ne o neki drugi.

seg.quote: There's a need for technical colleges as opposed to universities.
